attributes.action: Implement policy to enable the removal of disgraced MP's
attributes.additional_details: The sitting MP in my constituency should do the honorable thing and put herself up for re-election ASAP. This would allow the constituents a voice in choosing to re-elect or not.
attributes.background: Change policy to force by election in cases where sitting MP has been expelled from their party.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333424
